name: R5-DetectedIssue-R4B-DetectedIssue
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 DetectedIssue into FHIR R4B

target.comment: R5 `DetectedIssue` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue`

element.display: The provider or device that identified the issue

target.display: The provider or device that identified the issue
target.comment: R5 `DetectedIssue.author` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DetectedIssue.author` - author has change due to type change: R5 `author` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `author`

element.display: Type of detected issue, e.g. drug-drug, duplicate therapy, etc
Specific type of detected issue, e.g. drug-drug, duplicate therapy, etc

target.display: Issue Category, e.g. drug-drug, duplicate therapy, etc.
target.comment: R5 `DetectedIssue.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.code`
R5 `DetectedIssue.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.contained`
R5 `DetectedIssue.detail` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DetectedIssue.detail` - detail has change due to type change: R5 detail markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B detail

element.display: Encounter detected issue is part of

target.comment: R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence`
R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence.code`
R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence.detail` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence.detail`

R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

R5 `DetectedIssue.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DetectedIssue.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `DetectedIssue.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.id`
R5 `DetectedIssue.identified[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.identified[x]`

element.display: Unique id for the detected issue

target.display: Unique id for the detected issue
target.comment: R5 `DetectedIssue.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.identifier`
R5 `DetectedIssue.implicated` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.implicated`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `DetectedIssue.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.implicitRules`
R5 `DetectedIssue.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `DetectedIssue.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `DetectedIssue.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.meta`
R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation`
R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.action` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.action`
R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.author` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.author`
R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.date` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.date`

R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

R5 `DetectedIssue.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `DetectedIssue.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `DetectedIssue.reference` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.reference`

R5 `DetectedIssue.severity` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.severity` - severity has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/detectedissue-severity|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/detectedissue-severity|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

R5 `DetectedIssue.status` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/detectedissue-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-status|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `DetectedIssue.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `DetectedIssue.text`
